version.name: v1
version.xform: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> <xf:xforms xmlns:xf="http://www.w3.org/2002/xforms" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xf:model> <xf:instance id="generalopd"> <generalopd id="6" name="Outpatient Visit-"> <staffId/> <facilityId/> <formname/> <date/> <serialNumber/> <motechId/> <sex/> <dateOfBirth/> <insured/> <newCase/> <newPatient/> <diagnosis/> <otherdiagnosis/> <secondDiagnosis/> <othersecondarydiagnosis/> <rdtGiven/> <rdtPositive/> <actTreated/> <referred/> <comments/> <formtype>data_entry</formtype> </generalopd> </xf:instance> <xf:bind id="staffId" nodeset="/generalopd/staffId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="facilityId" nodeset="/generalopd/facilityId" required="true()" type="xsd:int" constraint=". < 2147483647" message="Number too large. Keep under 2147483647"/> <xf:bind id="formname" nodeset="/generalopd/formname" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="date" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/date" required="true()" type="xsd:date"/> <xf:bind constraint=". >= 0 and . < 2147483647" id="serialNumber" message="Number too large or negative. Keep under 2147483647" nodeset="/generalopd/serialNumber" required="true()" type="xsd:int"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="motechId" nodeset="/generalopd/motechId" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'motheropd-jf' or /generalopd/formname = 'childopd-jf'" type="xsd:int" visible="false()" constraint=". > 999999 and . < 10000000" message="MoTeCH ID must be 7 digits long" required="true()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="sex" nodeset="/generalopd/sex" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". <= 'today()'" id="dateOfBirth" message="Invalid date: date specified is in the future" nodeset="/generalopd/dateOfBirth" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'generalopd-jf'" required="true()" type="xsd:date" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="insured" nodeset="/generalopd/insured" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="newCase" nodeset="/generalopd/newCase" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="newPatient" nodeset="/generalopd/newPatient" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind id="diagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/diagnosis" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="otherdiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 76" nodeset="/generalopd/otherdiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="secondDiagnosis" nodeset="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" constraint=". >= 1 and . <= 76" id="othersecondarydiagnosis" message="Invalid diagnosis: value must be between 1 and 76" nodeset="/generalopd/othersecondarydiagnosis" relevant="/generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '78'" required="true()" type="xsd:int" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="rdtGiven" nodeset="/generalopd/rdtGiven" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '10' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '11' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '13' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '12' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '10' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '11' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '13' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '12'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="rdtPositive" nodeset="/generalopd/rdtPositive" relevant="/generalopd/rdtGiven = 'Y'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="actTreated" nodeset="/generalopd/actTreated" relevant="/generalopd/diagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/diagnosis = '64' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '63' or /generalopd/secondDiagnosis = '64'" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> <xf:bind id="referred" nodeset="/generalopd/referred" required="true()" type="xsd:string"/> <xf:bind action="show" id="comments" nodeset="/generalopd/comments" relevant="/generalopd/formname = 'motheropd-jf' or /generalopd/formname = 'childopd-jf'" type="xsd:string" visible="false()" required="false()"/> <xf:bind id="formtype" nodeset="/generalopd/formtype" required="true()" type="xsd:string" visible="false()"/> </xf:model> <xf:group id="1"> <xf:label>Page5</xf:label> <xf:input bind="staffId"> <xf:label>Staff ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="facilityId"> <xf:label>Facility ID</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:select1 bind="formname"> <xf:label>Type of client</xf:label> <xf:item id="motheropd-jf"> <xf:label>Pregnant mother</xf:label> <xf:value>motheropd-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="childopd-jf"> <xf:label>Child under 5 yrs</xf:label> <xf:value>childopd-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> <xf:item id="generalopd-jf"> <xf:label>General Client</xf:label> <xf:value>generalopd-jf</xf:value> </xf:item> </xf:select1> <xf:input bind="date"> <xf:label>Visit date</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="serialNumber"> <xf:label>Serial number</xf:label> </xf:input> <xf:input bind="motechId"> <xf:label>MoTeCH ID</xf:label>
